repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:7-alpine
MAINTAINER Serhiy Mytrovtsiy <mitrovtsiy@ukr.net>

ENV NODE_PATH=.:/usr/lib/node_modules:/node_modules

RUN set -x && \
    npm install --silent -g nodemon mocha && \
    mkdir -p /node_modules && npm cache clean --force;

COPY ./package.json /package.json
RUN npm install --silent --prefix / && npm cache clean --force;


COPY ./currency.json /currency.json
COPY ./app.js /app.js

EXPOSE 8080
CMD ["node", "/app.js"]
